scripts.prestart: ts-node --project src/scripts/tsconfig.json src/scripts/replaceChinesePunctuation.ts && ts-node --project src/scripts/tsconfig.json src/scripts/generateOverview.ts && ts-node --project src/scripts/tsconfig.json src/scripts/addLineBreakSpaces.ts
scripts.prebuild: ts-node --project src/scripts/tsconfig.json src/scripts/replaceChinesePunctuation.ts && ts-node --project src/scripts/tsconfig.json src/scripts/generateOverview.ts && ts-node --project src/scripts/tsconfig.json src/scripts/addLineBreakSpaces.ts
